transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji meri baat Pramod ji se ho rahi hai, Vilena Enterprises mein?
Executive: Ji, madam.
Customer: Namaskar sir, main Pragati baat kar rahi hoon senior head IndiaMART head office se. Aapki main discussion hui hai sir mere ex-executive ke saath Aditya ji ke saath.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Sir kya ho gaya service mein koi issue face kar rahe the aap bol rahe the ispe aapka update take care of fund chahiye aapko.
Customer: Ji, ji madam refund chahiye mujhe.
Customer: Sir refund ke liye kisne matlab aapko kisi ne kaha tha ki refund ho jata hai?
Customer: Mujhe kaha tha jab isiliye to madam bol rahe hain hum. Isiliye to bol raha hoon teen mahine ho gaye koi bhi business bhi nahi mila.
Customer: Sir kisne bola tha aapko ki refund ho jata hai aap ek baar bataye?
Customer: Mere se kya naam uska Dipanshu.
Customer: Dipanshu Tiwari.
Customer: Aapke ye matlab onboarded person hai jinhone aapko onboard kiya tha right Dipanshu Tiwari?
Customer: Maine haan Dipanshu Tiwari maine us us insan se ye bola tha mujhe do mahine ka de dijiye package agar ispe kaam aayega na to main aage already rahunga ispe join.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: To mere se bola ki do mahine nahi ki aap pura saal ka le lijiye agar nahi chale nahi aayega na kaam to ki aapka refund wapas aa jayega jo do mahine ka charge lagega na wo wapas aa jayega. Jab do mahine hue mujhe koi kaam kahin se nahi aaya. Fir uske baad mein maine phone kiya.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Dipanshu ke paas bhi phone kiya usne mera phone hi nahi receive karna hi band kar diya.
Executive: Thik hai.
Customer: Ji phone receive karna hi band kar diya koi baat nahi. Fir jo 9696 se maine ek baar call ki.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Fir jab bhi maine yahi bola maine ki sir koi kaam nahi aa raha isse mera do mahine ho gaye mujhe mera refund wapas karwa dijiye ab do se madam teen mahine ho gaye abhi tak ek kaam nahi aaya.
Customer: To hum ye yahi kehna chah rahe hain ki jo aapka teen mahine ka charges hai wo aap apna matlab ki kaat lijiye baad baki jo mera refund wapas bache wo please karwa dijiye.
Customer: Sir jaise aap ek to sir pehli baat to ye refund nahi hota hai but aapko kisi ne commit kara hai to aapke paas kuch likhit mein hai? Jaise sir kuch mail diya hua.
Customer: Nahi yaar sir to kuch nahi filhal kya hai na mail kya pehli baat mera jo phone tha wo wala chori ho gaya hai ab ye dusra phone liya hai ji.
Executive: Achcha.
Executive: Ji.
Executive: To jaise sir aapko jo mail pe humne proposal bheja tha jiske through aapne payment kari hogi.
Customer: Mam dekho kya nahi aisa to kuch nahi jo bolte hain ki 70 buyleads aayengi usme bhi to nahi mahine mein bol raha hoon main.
Executive: Achcha achcha thik hai thik hai sir.
Customer: Haan ji mahine mein bol rahe the ki 70 buyleads aayengi fir thik hai wo bhi to ekdam unki baat pe hi maine agree ho gaye the ki haan chalo 70 aayengi. Hame koi iska itna knowledge nahi tha ki ispe kya kaisa kaam aata hai kya nahi aata hai. Hum to unke bolne se aur sara kuch kehne se maan liya aur karwa liya.
Executive: Thik hai. Kumar sahab humne onboard karaya thik hai sir kisi ne bola hoga aap sir soche hoge ki mujhe business aayega to main IndiaMART join kar raha hoon correct hai sir?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Sir aapke liye aapka concern person main janti hoon sir wo sales person the unko document submit karne ki baki cheezon ki training di jati hai service jo part hota hai sir head office dekhta hai aur head office se Aditya aapka catalog dekhte hain service part mein sir aap unko call lagaoge na sir working hour mein wo aapka call agar by chance miss bhi karte hain to within half an hour aapko call back aa jayegi.
Customer: Achcha ji.
Executive: To aap is cheez ke liye bilkul nishchint rehna sir ki koi call nahi uthayega koi IndiaMART pe call ke liye.
Customer: Nahi wo dekho kya hai na jo Dipanshu ji hai main unko do mahine se call try kar raha hoon har ek hafte mein ek baar ya 15 din mein magar na hi wo call uthate na hi wapas call back karte hain.
Executive: Koi concern person sir wo hai nahi na aapke concern person Aditya hai but aapne jo cheez batai ki unhone aap se ye false commit kara tha ki refund ho jata hai to main ye jarur unke saath discuss karungi ki ye cheez kaise unhone bola kyuki sir jo cheez ho nahi sakti wo aapko commit karke aa gaye.
Customer: Dekho kya hai na mam agar aisa hota na kuch to hum do mahine ka hi karte ya ek mahine ka karwa lete beshak mere se ₹1000 jyada lag jate.
Executive: Ji ji ji.
Customer: Haan to hum pure saal ka kyun karta hai.
Executive: Bilkul sir aur sir aisa nahi hai ki aapki product line mein business nahi hai IndiaMART par door frame mein.
Customer: Mam business hoga har kisi ke paas magar mere paas nahi aa raha hai. Achcha mam ye bataiye agar mere paas business aata to hum isko matlab ki itna wo kyun lamba kheechte ki nahi mujhe refund wapas chahiye ye chahiye business aata hum aaram se ispe jude rehte aage chal ke aur bada package le lete aur jyada kaam karte isi cheez pe.
Executive: Sir sir ye Auraiya aapke aas paas hi padta hai na Vidhyapur ke?
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Sir aapka to Kanpur hai na sir matlab location Kanpur se. Sir ye Ram Murti agency ho gaye Motilal Sharma ho gaye ye sare hi IndiaMART pe listed hai aur IndiaMART pe achcha business kar rahe hain sir pichle saal se hain ye log.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Sharma furniture hai ek aapke yahan ke Shiv trader hai Kanpur ke hain Prachi steel work hai sir ye bhi Kanpur ke hain Kanpur fiber glass karke same sir product line hai inki bhi aur.
Customer: Mam mam jo ye aapne ginwaya hai na ye hai jarur IndiaMART pe magar package kisi ne nahi liya hai jo Prachi steel work hai na jo dusra wala.
Executive: Haan haan haan.
Customer: Wo bhi mera hi hai wo mera hi hai uspe package nahi liya hai maine.
Executive: Prachi pe to sir hai GST aapki verified aa rahi hai IndiaMART.
Customer: Haan GST GST verified hai magar package nahi liya hai mam maine.
Executive: Ek second sir main check kar le rahi hoon.
Customer: Kar lijiye check mera hi hai wo.
Executive: Kanpur ki main sir jitni companiya nikal ke dekh rahi thi ji main Kanpur ki baat kar raha hoon Ravi Ravi Kumar naam hai sir ji sir aapka ispe package nahi hai correct sir correct.
Customer: Ji.
Customer: Baki sir companiya to sir ek to Kanpur ki companiya Ram Murti agency TrustSeal chala rahi hai.
Customer: Wo chala rahe honge jo ye bata rahe ho na aap ki Prachi.
Customer: Jo Prachi wale hain ye mera hi hai.
Executive: Achcha ispe package nahi liya hai GST sara kuch add hai.
Executive: Haan sir Kanpur ki main GST verified company nikal rahi thi to ye bhi aayi usme sir ye.
Customer: Ab isme jo aapne ginwaye hai na GST ye verified hai isme kam se kam jyada jyada ek ek nikal sakta hai isme se jo Ram Murti wala bata rahe ho aap.
Executive: Ram Murti agency sir TrustSeal verified hai matlab aapke ek step upar ki services hai inki.
Customer: Ji ji.
Executive: Inhone chahe beshak package liya ho baki aur jitne verified hai inka sir.
Customer: Ji Inhone package liya hoga magar aur kisi ka package nahi hoga.
Executive: Nahi sir aapko main bata deti hoon aur kiska package hai BS metal industries inka bhi hai sir package paid paid service mein hai sir inka website ka package hai agar aap bologe sir to main detail bhi share karne ko tayar hoon BS metal and dot com karke sir ye company hai aur unhone website services li hai matlab TrustSeal ke bhi upar ki services hai aapko main ye kya hai sir ki is service mein benefit hai aapki jo sir basic package hai usme bhi benefit hai aur main aapko pata laga deti hoon to aapka catalog ek baar aapko repair karenge aap jo bhi buyleads bhejenge ek baar unpe connect karna agar aapko lagega sir wo jo share kar rahe hain inquiry usme bhi nahi aa raha hai to aap bas us group mein main add rahungi sir dekhne ke liye ki kaam ho raha hai ki nahi aap us group pe likh dena ki mujhe ye buyleads sahi nahi lagi aap dusri share kar do aapka sir ek baar consumption pattern set ho jayega aapko waisi hi inquiry aane lag jayegi.
Executive: Ye cheez main aapka thik kara ke deti hoon sir jo bhi aapko further issue aa raha hai.
Customer: Dekhiye mam kya hai na ki do mahino ke baad mein na teen mahine ho gaye ab fir iske baad mein fir hum aur mahine ek kaat le fir bhi matlab ki kaam na aaye fir main aapse yahi request karu ki agar ho sake to ye.
Executive: Aayega agar kaam nahi aata mere paas dhandha nahi hota sir to main aage se aapko kyun approach karti ki main dhandha dila dungi. Giant Angle plywood hai sir ye bhi TrustSeal verified hai decent interior house hai ye bhi TrustSeal verified hai window galaxy hai sir aisa nahi hai ki companies hai maine 10 se 12 company ka naam bata diya aur ye sare TrustSeal verified hai aapke liye.
Customer: To dhandha hai sir tabhi kar rahe hain ye IndiaMART pe kaam.
Customer: Door steel product dekho mam kaam kaam ka farak hota hai jo steel door frame ye Japani door frame hai main iski baat kar raha hoon main sun lijiye.
Executive: Steel door frame aur Japani door frame.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ek second sir main Japani mein dekh leti hoon.
Executive: Sir Japani door frame aapne dalwaya hai Japani chaukat door frame dalwaya hai ye wali category keh rahe ho na sir aap?
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Thik hai aur sir aapko kis mein hot selling product hai batana windows frame mein.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Thik hai door frame ho gaya sir Japani chaukat door frame ho gaya aapka WPC door frame ho gaya ye sari aapki hot selling product hai na category hai.
Customer: WPC nahi hai mam WPC nahi hai.
Executive: WPC mein kaam nahi karte ho sir aap?
Customer: Nahi nahi karte.
Executive: Thik hai WPC hata deti hoon aapka. Ab sir WPC mein aapka kaam nahi jaise door frame mein wooden door frame ek category hogi steel door frame ho gayi GI door frame ho gayi granite door frame ho gayi ye sari category mein deal karte ho aap?
Customer: Nahi granite mein nahi karte mam.
Executive: Teak wood door frame mein?
Customer: Teak wood mein bhi nahi karte.
Executive: Teak wood mein bhi nahi hai thik hai wooden window frame mein sir isme kaam karte hain?
Customer: Wooden aur window frame mein karte hain.
Executive: Thik hai WPC window frame mein?
Customer: Nahi karte mam.
Executive: Thik hai aluminium window frame mein?
Customer: Nahi karte.
Executive: UPVC window frame?
Customer: Nahi karte isme bhi.
Executive: Steel window frame?
Customer: Isme bhi nahi karte.
Executive: Thik hai thik hai sir aapne jitni category mujhe extra batai wo sari aur add kara deti hoon unki category se sir kya hota hai ki aapki direct inquiry aur call ka jo hai wo badhta hai.
Customer: Isse kuch bhi karwane se koi fayda nahi rahega wahi hai agar fayda nahi hoga to ek baar aur ek baar aur aap samjha chuke ho mujhe jab bhi maine refund ke liye hi bola tha ek mahine pehle maine meri aapse baat ho chuki hai nahi hai ki hui nahi hai maine Aditya ji ka number lagaya tha magar wo kya bolte hain unko dengue wagera ho gaya tha isliye call receive aapne aap se baat hui thi meri ji ji ji sir aapne mujhe samjhaya tha sara kuch yahi kuch bataya tha magar fir bhi nahi isliye maine fir aap time se maine aapka whatsapp group bhi create kara tha.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Main kara deti hoon aapko.
Customer: Maine kal parso phone parso call ki thi maine 96 se.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Haan to maine unse yahi bola mujhe mera refund wapas chahiye teen mahine ho gaye mujhe mera koi.
Executive: Jo aap call karte ho na wo mere paas escalate hoke aati hai to aapko behtar ki hame call laga lo kyuki maine us time pe bhi aapko bataya tha ki unke jo bhi sir case hote hain jispe assign hote hain wo usko escalate karke bhej dete hain jaise humne aaj join kara to aapka sir concern hamare paas aa gaya.
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Aur ab is group pe sir inhone create kara hai aapne jaise sir further future mein jo update nahi diya tha ki kis area ka chahiye aapko to ab batao sir mujhe kis area se chahiye aapko buyer.
Customer: Area maine mam us war bhi bataya tha aapko is war bhi bata raha hoon.
Executive: Isme group mein mention nahi hai Aditya ne do buyleads bhi bheji hai aur uspe aapka koi feedback nahi hai ki matlab kaisi hai wo buyleads aapke liye kaam ki hai ki nahi. Ek baar main bata do sir ek baar repeat kar do area aapka jo aapne bataya tha.
Customer: Main ek baar ek baat bolu?
Executive: Ji ji bataiye sir.
Customer: Ji main yahi kehna chah raha hoon agar refund wapas ho jaye to please refund karwa dijiye baki koi baat nahi main IndiaMART matlab ki chalaunga hi nahi.
Executive: Sir agar aisa ho pata to aapko kehna nahi padta sir policy nahi hai hamari main yahan pe matlab sir mujhe yahan pe bahut time ho chuka hai sir aisa nahi hai ki refund possible hota company ke account mein aapne pay kara hai agar koi glitch se sir aapka paisa refund ho jata to mujhe koi issue nahi hoti but sir policy nahi hai hame to sir isiliye bithaya gaya na hum aapko business dila sake.
Customer: Mam koi baat hi nahi aage koi baat hi nahi karni fir to main usse kya bolte hain Dipanshu jo hai na usi ko main kisi prakar se bula ke usi se nipat lu main sara kuch system.
Executive: Sir aap baat kar lena Dipanshu se to main khud baat karungi agar wo aapko aise fake commitment deke aaye hain to main apne end se bhi discuss karungi ye cheez unse but sir aap service parameter mein dekhoge to aapko hamare side se koi bhi issue nahi milega aur sir ispe assurance lo aap mujhse ki aapko business aayega agar agar aapke competitor ko sir aa raha hai tabhi wo aapke ek step upar ki service chala rahe hain to sir benefit hai tabhi chala rahe hain to hum aapko wo benefit kara ke denge.
Executive: Thik hai sir?
summary:
Concerns:

- Wants refund due to no business in 3 months.

- Claims executive promised refund if no business.

- Dipanshu is not answering the calls.



Resolution:

- Executive stated refund is not possible.

- Executive will discuss the false commitment with Dipanshu.

- Executive offered to fix the issues.

- Executive offered to repair catalog.

- Executive offered to add customer to a group.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will repair the catalog.

- Executive will add customer to a group.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, subscription, catalog
